what_we_decided: 2026-01-08 - Use prefix-based state files (e.g., 'meta-tracking-state.json') instead of nested directories due to Anthropic project file upload constraints
2026-01-08 - Only record decisions after user agreement - proposals should be questions or conversation, not 'decided' entries
2026-01-08 - State tracking is for record-keeping, not communication - always explain decisions/questions to user in natural language before/during tool calls
2026-01-08 - Keep 'important_files' field but constrain to entry points only (3-5 max) - purpose is navigation/onboarding, not exhaustive file tracking
2026-01-09 - Do NOT include init-subsystem command in MVP - philosophy prioritizes constraint-aware simplicity over comprehensive features
what_we_built: 2026-01-08 - Enhanced update.py with --subsystem flag and colon syntax (command:subsystem) for multi-file state tracking

2026-01-09 - README.md - comprehensive guide with philosophy, usage, constraints, FAQ
what_we_need_to_decide: 2026-01-08 - What work should 'important_files' field do - current uses are inconsistent (planned vs actual files, varying granularity)
